item.title: CIVIC - Construction in Vicinities: Innovative Co-creation
item.description: Construction is a necessity to create attractive and sustainable cities. However, the transport of goods and personnel to construction sites disturbs residents, businesses and road users. By involving stakeholders, the CIVIC project contributes to increased transport and energy efficiency as well as to minimized disruptions and nuisance from construction logistics.
